Token.Abstract: This is a singleton object that contains the base of the Worldpay Total calling methods.
Tells the WorldpayAPI object to send messages to the test host configured at compile time
Tells the WorldpayAPI object to send messages to the test host configured at compile time
Tells the WorldpayAPI object to send messages to the test host configured at compile time

When enabled, and TestHost is enabled, the debugDelegate will be sent HTTP request and response bodies for logging purposes. These bodies may contain PCI or PII data and may only be used with test cards on a test environment

Returns shared instance pointer of the WorldpayAPI entry point
Class instance init unavailable. Use WorldpayAPI instance to get class instance
Returns a pointer to a credit card swiper object

Parameter.Name: delegate
Parameter.Abstract: Delegate that will listen to swiper events

Token.Abstract: Authenticates user credentials against the World Pay server. The token will automatically be saved in the application keychain by the SDK and can be removed by calling: - clearSDKKeychain

Parameter.Name: authTokenRequest
Parameter.Abstract: Auth Token Request object containing user credentials

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion handler used to notify the caller of any server results or errors

Token.Abstract: Clears the keychain data out of the application. Completely resets the auth token information and removes it from the application keychain. A new auth token must be generated in order to make calls to the web APIs after this is executed
Gets the current batch identifier

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion handler used to notify the caller of any server results or errors

Token.Abstract: Closes the current batch

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion handler used to notify the caller of any server results or errors

Token.Abstract: Gets customer data from the server

Parameter.Name: customerId
Parameter.Abstract: Customer ID that reqpresents the desired customer

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion handler used to notify the caller of any server results or errors

Token.Abstract: Creates a new customer object to be stored on the server

Parameter.Name: customerData
Parameter.Abstract: The customer data that should be saved on the server

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion handler used to notify the caller of any server results or errors

Token.Abstract: Updates an existing customer on the server

Parameter.Name: customerId
Parameter.Abstract: Customer id corresponding to the customer being updated

Parameter.Name: customerData
Parameter.Abstract: The customer data that should be updated

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion handler used to notify the caller of any server results or errors

Token.Abstract: Get Gift Card from server

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: Gift card id

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion handler used to notify the caller of any server results or errors

Token.Abstract: Update gift card stored on the server

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: Identifier for the card to be updated

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion handler used to notify the caller of any server results or errors

Token.Abstract: Create a new gift card to be stored on the serfver

Parameter.Name: identifier
Parameter.Abstract: Identifier of the card to be stored on the server

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion handler used to notify the caller of any server results or errors

Token.Abstract: Delete a payment method being stored on the server

Parameter.Name: paymentMethod
Parameter.Abstract: Payment method to be deleted on the server

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion handler used to notify the caller of any server results or errors

Token.Abstract: Get payment method from the server

Parameter.Name: methodId
Parameter.Abstract: Identifier of the payment method stored on the server

Parameter.Name: customerId
Parameter.Abstract: Identifier of the customer associated with the payment method

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion handler used to notify the caller of any server results or errors

Token.Abstract: Update an existing payment method on the server

Parameter.Name: paymentMethod
Parameter.Abstract: The updated payment method

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion handler used to notify the caller of any server results or errors

Token.Abstract: Create a new payment method on the server

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: Request object containing the payment method information

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion handler used to notify the caller of any server results or errors

Token.Abstract: Request Authorization of a payment

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: Payment authorize request object with the appropriate payment information

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion handler used to notify the caller of any server results or errors

Token.Abstract: Capture an authorized payment

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: Payment capture request object with the information about the authorized request

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion handler used to notify the caller of any server results or errors

Token.Abstract: Immediately charge payment using the requested payment type

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: Payment charge request object containing all of the information needed to charge a payment

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion handler used to notify the caller of any server results or errors

Token.Abstract: Card verification allows merchants to verify the cardholder account number, address, or security code.

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: Payment verify request object containing all of the information needed to verify the payment card

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion handler used to notify the caller of any server results or errors

Token.Abstract: Void an authorized payment

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: Payment Void request object that contains the needed information to void an authorized transaction

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion handler used to notify the caller of any server results or errors

Token.Abstract: Refund a payment that has been captured

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: PaymentRefund request object needed to refund a captured payment

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion handler used to notify the caller of any server results or errors

Token.Abstract: Request a credit to the tender in the request object

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: Payment Credit request object containing the tender info needed to apply a credit

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Completion handler used to notify the caller of any server results or errors

Token.Abstract: Get details for a transaction by identifier

Parameter.Name: transactionId
Parameter.Abstract: transaction identifier

Parameter.Abstract: Completion handler used to notify the caller of any server results or errors

Token.Abstract: Search transactions

Parameter.Name: searchParams
Parameter.Abstract: Search parameters include the start and end date for the search

Parameter.Abstract: Completion handler used to notify the caller of any server results or errors

Token.Abstract: Get transactions in the current batch

Parameter.Abstract: Batch identifier for transactions
